name: Meddyglyn
description:
As the new brewer in the city of Matzig, you've got a lot to prove. Combine 12 ingredients in thousands of combinations to satisfy your thirsty customers desires.

Meanwhile, trouble is brewing on the horizons. Tensions are high with the neighbouring Duchy of Reizveld - could war be brewing? There are even rumours of a new plague, one that the healers can't seem to treat...

Interact with this rich world and its people through the mead you brew, and see how the actions of one humble brewer can change the city... Forever!
